app_name: Groups Control Groups Voice Recording and Karaoke Apps Speech talk and voice to text
app_description: Odrey is the easiest way to convert audio and video to text. The application offers a number of options to work with files: direct recording audio video download and several sharing options. Functionality 1. Direct record and import Odrey offers several file management options: you can record audio directly in the application or download previously recorded audio and video. 2. The variety of languages Odrey supports a huge number of languages so it can be useful to everyone. 3. Smart cut When you pause Odrey will break the text into paragraphs which makes it easier to navigate and edit the text. 4. No restrictions Odrey allows you to decrypt files of any size saving your time and effort. Privacy policy: https: odreyapp.com privacy_policy Terms of use: https: odreyapp.com terms
